templates.name: NPS
templates.description: Measure the customer experience of your company with Net Performance Score (NPS) on a quarterly basis. All that you need are NPS with the number of detractors, passives and promoters respondents.

templates.name: Absenteeism Rate
templates.description: How engaged are your employees? Average absenteeism rate as a percentage of the total working days among all employees

templates.name: NPS Respondents
templates.description: Easily track on a quarterly basis the answers of Net Performance Score survey. All that you need are the number of detractors, passives and promoters respondents.

templates.name: Sales by Product Category
templates.description: Visualize and compare with a barplot the amount of quarterly sales of different product category.

templates.name: Impression by Weekday
templates.description: Visualize and compare with a barplot the number of times your post was visible in someone’s feed (impression) with the number of users on the webpage.

templates.name: Trend Impression
templates.description: Visualize and compare with a time series the evolution of impression and total users on daily basis. This doesn’t necessarily mean the person who viewed the post noticed it or read it.

templates.name: Click-Through Rate
templates.description: Keyword Click-Through Rate metrics measure how often your listings on the SERPs (Search Engine Results Pages) generates clicks compared the number of times your listing appears in search results.

templates.name: Unique Users
templates.description: Overall number of unique users during a specific period who visited your site for the first time. The value is compared with the number of impressions.

templates.name: Conversion Rate
templates.description: Visualize with a time series the percentage of website visitors who completed a conversion on a daily basis. The y-axis is expressed in %.

templates.name: Monthly New Leads
templates.description: Visualize the number of new leads acquired in the past month, i.e. someone creating an account on your online retail site. The barplot tracks the new leads comparing different sources.

templates.name: Monthly Website Traffic
templates.description: Monitor in a monthly time series the total number of visits of your web page.

templates.name: Returning vs New Visitors
templates.description: By measuring the number of returning visitors, you see how engaged your audience is. The following barplot compare new visitors vs old visitors on a quarterly basis.

templates.name: Average Time on Page
templates.description: How much time spend your clients reading your content each month? The higher your website’s average time on site, the more likely you rank well on search results and convert more visitors to leads.

templates.name: Training Summary
templates.description: Do you invest in your employees? How much you have invested onboarding new hires and upgrading one’s education.

templates.name: Compare Ticket by Status and Problem
templates.description: Compare the number of ticket by the type of problem and their status. This helps to understand if some problems have more propensity to be more suspended or not.

templates.name: Trend ticket by open and closing dates
templates.description: With this template you can compare the ticket trend by open and closing dates. Using this visualization helps to understand if the majority of the ticket are open rather than closed.

templates.name: Number of tickets with angry emotion
templates.description: Understand the sentiment and the emotion of the users might help to develop a more elevate conversations and supports with the customers.

templates.name: Top Suppliers
templates.description: Compare Suppliers based on the Total Spendings over a fixed period of time.

templates.name: New Users
templates.description: With this template you can compare new users gained by every nation.

templates.name: Brand Reputation
templates.description: Understand how a yuor brand is viewed by everyone else.

templates.name: Competitor Analysis
templates.description: Understand what your competitors are doing to better set up the business strategies.

templates.name: Crisis Management
templates.description: Get notified when certain events occur over a specified amount of time and decide for effective solutions.

templates.name: Trend Analysis
templates.description: Analyze any public debate by tracking over time how, when, where and who is talking about it.

templates.name: Audience By Gender
templates.description: Displays the gender proportion of the customers involved in your business.

templates.name: Trending Topics
templates.description: Understand which subjects experience a surge in popularity on one or more social media platforms for a limited duration of time.

templates.name: Audience By Age
templates.description: Analyze the age distributions of your audiences.

templates.name: Audience Topic
templates.description: Analyze the topics that are being discussed within your audience.

templates.name: Recruiting conversion rate by department
templates.description: Measures the ratio of the total number of applicants, that are actually turned into hired employees at the end of the process.

templates.name: Total HR training cost by month
templates.description: It is a helpful metric to track employees’ training costs by month.

templates.name: Training cost vs recruitment cost
templates.description: Comparison of investments made into development and recruitment.

templates.name: Total training cost by business function
templates.description: Shows training cost spending by business function in 2020.

templates.name: Montly training cost for Marketing
templates.description: Shows monthly training cost spending in Marketing department in 2020.

templates.name: YTD training cost by business function
templates.description: Shows training cost spending comparison year-to-date in 2020 and 2021 by business function as of September 2021.

templates.name: MoM total training costs
templates.description: Shows training cost spending comparison month over month in 2020 and 2021.

templates.name: YoY recruiting conversion rate by business function
templates.description: Shows year over year 2019 vs 2020 comparison in recruiting rate for different business functions.

templates.name: Total training cost by year
templates.description: Shows total training cost spending by year in 2010 - 2020.

templates.name: Recruiting conversion rate by year
templates.description: Shows recruiting conversion rate by year in 2010 - 2020.

templates.name: Average employees timestay by number of years
templates.description: Shows percent of employees stayed within a company in 2015 - 2020 by average number of years.

templates.name: Percent of employees staying inb company from 5 to 10 years
templates.description: Shows percent of employees stayed within a company from 5 to 10 years in 2015 - 2020.

templates.name: Average absence rate by department
templates.description: Shows percentage of the total working days among all employees by department in 2020.

templates.name: Absence rate for Marketing
templates.description: Shows percentage of the total working days among all employees in Marketing department in 2020.

templates.name: Absence rate for Marketing
templates.description: Shows percentage of the total working days among all employees in Marketing department in 2020.

templates.name: Average employee timestay
templates.description: Shows percent of employees stayed within a company by average number of years in 2020.

templates.name: Total monthly training cost vs ROI
templates.description: Shows comparison of investments made into employees' development and company's ROI.

templates.description: Is the time between a customer raising a ticket and an agent first responding to it. Here is shown statistics by channel.

templates.name: Peak days in September
templates.description: Days in September when most calls/e-mail/chat came in.

templates.name: Peak months in 2020
templates.description: Months in 2020 when most calls/e-mail/chat came in.

templates.name: Total spendings by supplier
templates.description: Shows amount of money spent on each supplier in 2020.

templates.name: Total spendings by project
templates.description: Shows amount of money spent on each supplier by project managed in 2018 - 2020.

templates.name: Number of suppliers by service type
templates.description: Shows total number of suppliers the company deals with.

templates.name: Cost spendings comparison by year and business function
templates.description: Shows amount of money spent on different suppliers per business funcations for the period 2018-2020.

templates.name: Number of suppliers by country
templates.description: Shows number of suppliers from different countries company worked with in 2020.

templates.name: Number of projects by supplier
templates.description: Shows number of project managed per supplier in 2020.

templates.name: Number of suppliers by year
templates.description: Shows number of suppliers company workedc with from 2015 to 2020.

templates.name: Complience rate for suppliers
templates.description: Shows supplier’s compliance with company's business requirements.

templates.name: Number of suppliers managed by Responsible employee
templates.description: Shows workload of Responsible employees measured by number of managed suppliers.

templates.name: Complience rate by years vs target
templates.description: Shows suppliers's complience rate in comparison to established target.

templates.name: Bounce rate
templates.description: Shows the percentage of visitors who enter a site and exit without viewing a second page.

templates.name: Average order value
templates.description: Tracks the average amount spent each time a customer places an order on a website or mobile app.

templates.name: Number of purchases completed vs number of purchases initiated
templates.description: Shows how many purchases were abandoned before completing in comparison with purchases done.

templates.name: Shopping cart abandoment rate
templates.description: Shows percentage of visits on a web page with abandoned shopping carts before purchase completion.

templates.name: Shopping cart abandoment rate
templates.description: Shows percentage of visits on a web page with abandoned shopping carts before purchase completion. Here is shown trend by month in 2019-2020.

templates.name: Monthly active users
templates.description: Shows the number of unique users who have opened the application during the last 30 days. Here is shown MAU for Italy and France in 2020.

templates.name: Monthly active users in Italy
templates.description: Shows the number of unique users who have opened the application during the last 30 days. Here is shown MAU for Italy in 2020.

templates.name: Weekly active users in Italy
templates.description: Shows the number of unique users who have opened the application during a week. Here is shown WAU for Italy in 2020.

templates.name: Maximum weekly active users by country
templates.description: Shows the maximum number of unique users opened the application during a week. Here is shown maximum WAU per country in 2020.

templates.description: Shows number of unique users opened the application during a week. Here is shown WAU trends for Italy and United Staes in 2020.

templates.name: Weekly active users by country

templates.name: Daily active users

templates.description: Shows number of unique users opened the application during a day. Here is shown DAU by country on 1 January 2021.

templates.name: Daily active users in Russia
templates.description: Shows number of unique users opened the application during a day. Here is shown DAU inb Russia on January 2020.

templates.description: Shows how much recurring revenue you can expect based on yearly subscriptions. Here is shown ARR by product in 2015-2020.

templates.description: This metrics helps to assess this channel’s efficiency in your marketing efforts.
